DOC.brief_summary: The objective study capture information gastrointestinal tolerance ( GI ) oral nutritional supplement contain new protein blend healthy child age ≥ 3 ≤ 10 year .
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 3 ≤ 10 year age Healthy suffer physical disability . Heightforage BMIforage 5th 95th percentile well weightforage 5th 85th percentile Consumption 2 servings/day investigational product 7 consecutive day Willingness follow study procedure record data diary complete form assessment need throughout study Agreement consume nutritional product study product study period History acute chronic condition may affect feed habit nutritional status Medications nutritional supplement , take daily basis 2 week past month prior screen visit may profoundly affect feed habit nutritional status Clinically significant nutritional deficiency require specific treatment Acute/chronic condition require medical treatment may include hospitalization diabetes stress induced hyperglycemia , dialysis treatment , inflammatory bowel disease , pancreatitis , autoimmune disease immunodeficiency , celiac disease , cystic fibrosis , active tuberculosis , malformation gastrointestinal tract gastroesophageal reflux disease History constipation Allergy intolerance ingredient study product Gastrointestinal infection acute diarrhea time study start Hepatitis B C , HIV , malignancy Congenital cardiac defect Antibiotic therapy within last 2 week start study Dysphagia , aspiration risk , difficulty swallow due acquired/congenital abnormality
